channel.title: Help with models, smart people pl0x
channel.description:
I am attempting to add dragonclaw models to the battlescape client.
new to clients
I am using this guide as an outline, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html
I am not to sure what to do, I know I add the items to itemdef But, I can't find where to put the models so they can be loaded. I just keep getting errors. Looking in Item def, they have some models going up to 18000+ but [b]i can't access pali_cache or anything, to find out where these models are.[/b]Need some help or a good point in the right direction
[URL=http://img9.imageshack.us/i/clienterros.png/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/2944/clienterros.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: Help with models, smart people pl0x

item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

I am attempting to add dragonclaw models to the battlescape client.

new to clients

I am using this guide as an outline, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html

I am not to sure what to do, I know I add the items to itemdef But, I can’t find where to put the models so they can be loaded. I just keep getting errors. Looking in Item def, they have some models going up to 18000+ but i can’t access pali_cache or anything, to find out where these models are.Need some help or a good point in the right direction
